017package imagingbook.parboiled;
018
019import imagingbook.parboiled.common.Preconditions;
020import imagingbook.parboiled.common.StringUtils;
021import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.ActionMatcher;
022import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.AnyMatcher;
023import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.AnyOfMatcher;
024import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.CharIgnoreCaseMatcher;
025import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.CharMatcher;
026import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.CharRangeMatcher;
027import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.CustomMatcher;
028import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.EmptyMatcher;
029import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.FirstOfMatcher;
030import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.FirstOfStringsMatcher;
031import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.Matcher;
032import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.MemoMismatchesMatcher;
033import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.NothingMatcher;
034import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.OneOrMoreMatcher;
035import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.OptionalMatcher;
036import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.ProxyMatcher;
037import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.SequenceMatcher;
038import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.StringMatcher;
039import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.TestMatcher;
040import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.TestNotMatcher;
041import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.VarFramingMatcher;
042import imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.ZeroOrMoreMatcher;
043import imagingbook.parboiled.matchervisitors.MatcherVisitor;
044
045import java.util.ArrayList;
046import java.util.Collections;
047import java.util.HashSet;
048import java.util.List;
049import java.util.Set;
050
051public class ParserStatistics implements MatcherVisitor<ParserStatistics> {
052
053    private final Matcher root;
054    private int totalRules;
055    private final Set<AnyMatcher> anyMatchers = new HashSet<AnyMatcher>();
056    private final Set<CharIgnoreCaseMatcher> charIgnoreCaseMatchers = new HashSet<CharIgnoreCaseMatcher>();
057    private final Set<CharMatcher> charMatchers = new HashSet<CharMatcher>();
058    private final Set<CustomMatcher> customMatchers = new HashSet<CustomMatcher>();
059    private final Set<CharRangeMatcher> charRangeMatchers = new HashSet<CharRangeMatcher>();
060    private final Set<AnyOfMatcher> anyOfMatchers = new HashSet<AnyOfMatcher>();
061    private final Set<EmptyMatcher> emptyMatchers = new HashSet<EmptyMatcher>();
062    private final Set<FirstOfMatcher> firstOfMatchers = new HashSet<FirstOfMatcher>();
063    private final Set<FirstOfStringsMatcher> firstOfStringMatchers = new HashSet<FirstOfStringsMatcher>();
064    private final Set<NothingMatcher> nothingMatchers = new HashSet<NothingMatcher>();
065    private final Set<OneOrMoreMatcher> oneOrMoreMatchers = new HashSet<OneOrMoreMatcher>();
066    private final Set<OptionalMatcher> optionalMatchers = new HashSet<OptionalMatcher>();
067    private final Set<SequenceMatcher> sequenceMatchers = new HashSet<SequenceMatcher>();
068    private final Set<StringMatcher> stringMatchers = new HashSet<StringMatcher>();
069    private final Set<TestMatcher> testMatchers = new HashSet<TestMatcher>();
070    private final Set<TestNotMatcher> testNotMatchers = new HashSet<TestNotMatcher>();
071    private final Set<ZeroOrMoreMatcher> zeroOrMoreMatchers = new HashSet<ZeroOrMoreMatcher>();
072
073    private final Set<Action> actions = new HashSet<Action>();
074    private final Set<Class<?>> actionClasses = new HashSet<Class<?>>();
075    private final Set<ProxyMatcher> proxyMatchers = new HashSet<ProxyMatcher>();
076    private final Set<VarFramingMatcher> varFramingMatchers = new HashSet<VarFramingMatcher>();
077    private final Set<MemoMismatchesMatcher> memoMismatchesMatchers = new HashSet<MemoMismatchesMatcher>();
078
079    @SuppressWarnings({"unchecked"})
080    public static ParserStatistics generateFor(Rule rule) {
081        Preconditions.checkArgNotNull(rule, "rule");
082        Matcher matcher = (Matcher) rule;
083        return matcher.accept(new ParserStatistics(matcher));
084    }
085
086    private ParserStatistics(Matcher root) {
087        this.root = root;
088        countSpecials(root);
089    }
090
091    public Rule getRootRule() {
092        return root;
093    }
094
095    public int getTotalRules() {
096        return totalRules;
097    }
098
099    public Set<AnyMatcher> getAnyMatchers() {
100        return anyMatchers;
101    }
102
103    public Set<CharIgnoreCaseMatcher> getCharIgnoreCaseMatchers() {
104        return charIgnoreCaseMatchers;
105    }
106
107    public Set<CharMatcher> getCharMatchers() {
108        return charMatchers;
109    }
110
111    public Set<CustomMatcher> getCustomMatchers() {
112        return customMatchers;
113    }
114
115    public Set<CharRangeMatcher> getCharRangeMatchers() {
116        return charRangeMatchers;
117    }
118
119    public Set<AnyOfMatcher> getAnyOfMatchers() {
120        return anyOfMatchers;
121    }
122
123    public Set<EmptyMatcher> getEmptyMatchers() {
124        return emptyMatchers;
125    }
126
127    public Set<FirstOfMatcher> getFirstOfMatchers() {
128        return firstOfMatchers;
129    }
130
131    public Set<FirstOfStringsMatcher> getFirstOfStringMatchers() {
132        return firstOfStringMatchers;
133    }
134
135    public Set<MemoMismatchesMatcher> getMemoMismatchesMatchers() {
136        return memoMismatchesMatchers;
137    }
138
139    public Set<NothingMatcher> getNothingMatchers() {
140        return nothingMatchers;
141    }
142
143    public Set<OneOrMoreMatcher> getOneOrMoreMatchers() {
144        return oneOrMoreMatchers;
145    }
146
147    public Set<OptionalMatcher> getOptionalMatchers() {
148        return optionalMatchers;
149    }
150
151    public Set<SequenceMatcher> getSequenceMatchers() {
152        return sequenceMatchers;
153    }
154
155    public Set<StringMatcher> getStringMatchers() {
156        return stringMatchers;
157    }
158
159    public Set<TestMatcher> getTestMatchers() {
160        return testMatchers;
161    }
162
163    public Set<TestNotMatcher> getTestNotMatchers() {
164        return testNotMatchers;
165    }
166
167    public Set<ZeroOrMoreMatcher> getZeroOrMoreMatchers() {
168        return zeroOrMoreMatchers;
169    }
170
171    public Set<Action> getActions() {
172        return actions;
173    }
174
175    public Set<Class<?>> getActionClasses() {
176        return actionClasses;
177    }
178
179    public Set<ProxyMatcher> getProxyMatchers() {
180        return proxyMatchers;
181    }
182
183    public Set<VarFramingMatcher> getVarFramingMatchers() {
184        return varFramingMatchers;
185    }
186
187    // MatcherVisitor interface
188
189    public ParserStatistics visit(ActionMatcher matcher) {
190        if (!actions.contains(matcher.action)) {
191            totalRules++;
192            actions.add(matcher.action);
193            actionClasses.add(matcher.action.getClass());
194        }
195        return this;
196    }
197
198    public ParserStatistics visit(AnyMatcher matcher) {
199        return visit(matcher, anyMatchers);
200    }
201
202    public ParserStatistics visit(CharIgnoreCaseMatcher matcher) {
203        return visit(matcher, charIgnoreCaseMatchers);
204    }
205
206    public ParserStatistics visit(CharMatcher matcher) {
207        return visit(matcher, charMatchers);
208    }
209
210    public ParserStatistics visit(CustomMatcher matcher) {
211        return visit(matcher, customMatchers);
212    }
213
214    public ParserStatistics visit(CharRangeMatcher matcher) {
215        return visit(matcher, charRangeMatchers);
216    }
217
218    public ParserStatistics visit(AnyOfMatcher matcher) {
219        return visit(matcher, anyOfMatchers);
220    }
221
222    public ParserStatistics visit(EmptyMatcher matcher) {
223        return visit(matcher, emptyMatchers);
224    }
225
226    public ParserStatistics visit(FirstOfMatcher matcher) {
227        return matcher instanceof FirstOfStringsMatcher ?
228                visit((FirstOfStringsMatcher)matcher, firstOfStringMatchers) :
229                visit(matcher, firstOfMatchers);
230    }
231
232    public ParserStatistics visit(NothingMatcher matcher) {
233        return visit(matcher, nothingMatchers);
234    }
235
236    public ParserStatistics visit(OneOrMoreMatcher matcher) {
237        return visit(matcher, oneOrMoreMatchers);
238    }
239
240    public ParserStatistics visit(OptionalMatcher matcher) {
241        return visit(matcher, optionalMatchers);
242    }
243
244    public ParserStatistics visit(SequenceMatcher matcher) {
245        return matcher instanceof StringMatcher ?
246                visit((StringMatcher)matcher, stringMatchers) :
247                visit(matcher, sequenceMatchers);
248    }
249
250    public ParserStatistics visit(TestMatcher matcher) {
251        return visit(matcher, testMatchers);
252    }
253
254    public ParserStatistics visit(TestNotMatcher matcher) {
255        return visit(matcher, testNotMatchers);
256    }
257
258    public ParserStatistics visit(ZeroOrMoreMatcher matcher) {
259        return visit(matcher, zeroOrMoreMatchers);
260    }
261
262    private <M extends Matcher> ParserStatistics visit(M matcher, Set<M> set) {
263        if (!set.contains(matcher)) {
264            totalRules++;
265            set.add(matcher);
266            for (Matcher child : matcher.getChildren()) {
267                countSpecials(child);
268                child.accept(this);
269            }
270        }
271        return this;
272    }
273
274    private void countSpecials(Matcher matcher) {
275        if (matcher instanceof ProxyMatcher) {
276            proxyMatchers.add((ProxyMatcher) matcher);
277        } else if (matcher instanceof VarFramingMatcher) {
278            varFramingMatchers.add((VarFramingMatcher) matcher);
279        } else if (matcher instanceof MemoMismatchesMatcher) {
280            memoMismatchesMatchers.add((MemoMismatchesMatcher) matcher);
281        }
282    }
283
284    @Override
285    public String toString() {
286        return new StringBuilder("Parser statistics for rule '").append(root).append("':\n")
287                .append("    Total rules       : ").append(totalRules).append('\n')
288                .append("        Actions       : ").append(actions.size()).append('\n')
289                .append("        Any           : ").append(anyMatchers.size()).append('\n')
290                .append("        CharIgnoreCase: ").append(charIgnoreCaseMatchers.size()).append('\n')
291                .append("        Char          : ").append(charMatchers.size()).append('\n')
292                .append("        Custom        : ").append(customMatchers.size()).append('\n')
293                .append("        CharRange     : ").append(charRangeMatchers.size()).append('\n')
294                .append("        AnyOf         : ").append(anyOfMatchers.size()).append('\n')
295                .append("        Empty         : ").append(emptyMatchers.size()).append('\n')
296                .append("        FirstOf       : ").append(firstOfMatchers.size()).append('\n')
297                .append("        FirstOfStrings: ").append(firstOfStringMatchers.size()).append('\n')
298                .append("        Nothing       : ").append(nothingMatchers.size()).append('\n')
299                .append("        OneOrMore     : ").append(oneOrMoreMatchers.size()).append('\n')
300                .append("        Optional      : ").append(optionalMatchers.size()).append('\n')
301                .append("        Sequence      : ").append(sequenceMatchers.size()).append('\n')
302                .append("        String        : ").append(stringMatchers.size()).append('\n')
303                .append("        Test          : ").append(testMatchers.size()).append('\n')
304                .append("        TestNot       : ").append(testNotMatchers.size()).append('\n')
305                .append("        ZeroOrMore    : ").append(zeroOrMoreMatchers.size()).append('\n')
306                .append('\n')
307                .append("    Action Classes    : ").append(actionClasses.size()).append('\n')
308                .append("    ProxyMatchers     : ").append(proxyMatchers.size()).append('\n')
309                .append("    VarFramingMatchers: ").append(varFramingMatchers.size()).append('\n')
310                .append("MemoMismatchesMatchers: ").append(memoMismatchesMatchers.size()).append('\n')
311                .toString();
312    }
313
314    public String printActionClassInstances() {
315        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder("Action classes and their instances for rule '")
316                .append(root).append("':\n");
317
318        for (String line : printActionClassLines()) {
319            sb.append("    ").append(line).append('\n');
320        }
321        return sb.toString();
322    }
323
324    private List<String> printActionClassLines() {
325        List<String> lines = new ArrayList<String>();
326        int anonymous = 0;
327        for (Class<?> actionClass : actionClasses) {
328            String name = actionClass.getSimpleName();
329            if (StringUtils.isEmpty(name)) {
330                anonymous++;
331            } else {
332                lines.add(name + " : " + StringUtils.join(printActionClassInstances(actionClass), ", "));
333            }
334        }
335        Collections.sort(lines);
336        if (anonymous > 0) lines.add("and " + anonymous + " anonymous instance(s)");
337        return lines;
338    }
339
340    private List<String> printActionClassInstances(Class<?> actionClass) {
341        List<String> actionNames = new ArrayList<String>();
342        for (Action action : actions) {
343            if (action.getClass().equals(actionClass)) {
344                actionNames.add(action.toString());
345            }
346        }
347        Collections.sort(actionNames);
348        return actionNames;
349    }
350
351}
